Edges-Shaman -- Female Human Seasoned Shaman
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d10 Strength: d4 Vigor: d8
Skills (16 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d6 Shooting: (agi) d4
Boating: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d10 Performance: (spi) d4 Taunt: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Skill Notes:
All Thumbs: Suffers -2 using mechanical and electrical devices; critical failure breaks device
Sacred Fetish: May reroll Faith when fetish is held or prominently worn
Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 6; Skill: 4
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Shaman); Holy/Unholy Warrior; Primal Magic; Sacred Fetish Hindrances: All Thumbs; Cautious; Poverty; Thin Skinned Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Shaman): Has Armor Interference, Favored Power, Fetish, and Quirk features
Cautious: Requires a detailed plan before acting
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Quirk: Has a minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Combat
Parry: 4 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (1) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Tunic Shield: None Weapons: Cutlass (d4+d6); Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Hand Crossbow (2d4 R5"); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Shaman): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Armor Interference: In medium or heavy armor, suffers -4 arcane skill rolls and cannot use arcane edge features
Favored Power: Ignores 2 points of penalties when casting chosen power
Fetish: -2 arcane skill rolls when fetish is unavailable
Holy/Unholy Warrior: May spend 1-4 Power Points to add an equal amount to a Soak roll
Primal Magic: Powers inflict +2 damage/Critical failure stuns all in a 3" radius
